report.title: UKBMS Section Plot
report.description: UKBMS specific: Lists occurrences at a section level.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations transect JOIN locations section ON section.parent_id=transect.id JOIN samples ps ON ps.location_id = transect.id JOIN samples ss ON ss.parent_id=ps.id AND ss.location_id = section.id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=ss.id AND o.zero_abundance='f' JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id #joins# WHERE transect.deleted=false AND transect.id = #location_id# AND #website_filter# AND transect.location_type_id = #location_type_id#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include
